Detailed Description

This class manages what can happen and when, while the game is running.

To be more specific, this class manages the switching of states - such as moving from LOADING to GAMEPLAY - and also running multiple concurrent states - such as GAMEPLAY + MENU. Some states also have their own state managers, for instance GAMEPLAY has a state manager for switching between NORMAL, PAUSED, and RESULT states.
